video_caption: The video opens with a black screen displaying the word "DIOCLETIAN" in a stylized, metallic font, setting a dramatic tone. The scene transitions to an outdoor setting where two men are seated at a wooden table, engaged in a conversation. The man on the left, wearing a black t-shirt with the word "SEZEN" printed on it, has visible tattoos on his arms and holds a microphone, suggesting he is the interviewee. A beer bottle is placed on the table in front of him. The man on the right, dressed in a striped shirt, holds a microphone, indicating he is the interviewer. The background features a rustic wooden structure with a brick wall and windows, creating a casual and relaxed atmosphere. The video captures the interaction between the two men, focusing on their dialogue and expressions, with the interviewee gesturing with his hands to emphasize his points. The setting remains consistent throughout, maintaining the outdoor, rustic ambiance. The video concludes with a black screen displaying the text "www.dioecletian.com" in white, providing a website for further information.

In the video, two men are seated at a wooden table in a rustic setting, engaged in a conversation. The man on the left, wearing a black t-shirt with the word "SEPPSKIN" printed on it, has tattoos on his arms and is holding a microphone. He gestures with his hands as he speaks, occasionally taking a sip from a beer bottle placed on the table. The man on the right, dressed in a striped shirt, listens attentively while holding a microphone. The background features a brick wall and wooden beams, creating a cozy atmosphere. The scene remains consistent throughout, with the men continuing their discussion, and the beer bottle remains on the table.

The man on the left, who has a shaved head and tattoos on his arms, is wearing a black t-shirt with the word "BEZSKOK" printed on it. He is actively speaking and gesturing with his hands, indicating he is engaged in the conversation. The man on the right, who has short brown hair, is wearing a striped shirt and is attentively listening to the speaker. A bottle of beer is placed on the table in front of the man on the left, adding to the casual atmosphere of the setting. The background includes a window with a view of the outside, and the overall ambiance suggests a relaxed and informal interview environment.
